name: Hexio
description:
Hexio is a relaxing, mind-bending, minimalist puzzle game that offers 96 meticulously designed levels to immerse yourself into. Connect all the nodes into beautiful and abstract shapes in this exciting puzzle game. A beautiful piano soundtrack accompanies you in your delightful experience.

How to Play


Each node must make a specific number of connections. Connect the nodes such that all of them have fulfilled that requirement.

Features


★ 96 hand-crafted Puzzles
★ Clean and Minimalist Design
★ Hints available to help solve puzzles
★ Supports cloud saving
★ Optimized for human brains

Enjoy the Experience!
